Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Yithi (Muhammad): “Mna ndilumkisa kuphela ngesiTyhilelo (esivela kuAllâh) kodwa izithulu aziluva ubizo xa zilunyukiswa
Ke kaloku xa umfutho (nje) wesohlwayo seNkosi yakho unokubarheca, angekhe bangathi, “Yeha kuthi! Inene, thina besingabenzi bobubi.”

Ke kaloku Siza kumisela umthetho wokulingana wobulungisa ngoMhla woVuko, yaye akukho bani uza kuphathwa ngokungenabulungisa nangantoni na. Ke kaloku ukuba kuthe kwakho ubunzima (bezenzo ezilungileyo nokuba zezingalunganga) obungangobekhozo lwemostadi. Siya kubuzisa (obo bunzima ngaphambili). Sanele Thina Sisedwa ukufaka embuzweni
Inene Thina Sanika uMûsâ noHârûn inqobo (yokwahlula phakathi kokulungileyo nokungalunganga), nokukhanya okukhazimlayo nenkumbuzo kumalungisa
Abo bayoyikayo iNkosi yabo bengaYiboni nokuYibona, bona bayayoyika neYure
Le ‘Kur’ân ngumyalezo osikelelekileyo eSiwuthumele phantsi (emhlabeni). Ingaba niza kuyiphika
Kananjalo inene Thina Sanika uIbrâhîm ugwebo olulungileyo mandulo, yaye Thina Sasisazi kakhulu ngaye
Yabona wathi kutata wakhe nakubantu bakubo: “Yeyantoni na le mifanekiso iqingqiweyo nizinikele kangaka kuyo?”
Bathi bona: “Thina safumana oobawo bethu bekhonza yona.”
Wathi yena: “Inene nina noobawo benu nanisekulahlekeni okucacileyo.”
Bathi bona: “Ingaba wena usizele nenyaniso na, okanye ungomnye wabo bagculelayo kusini na?”
Wathi yena: “Nakanye ukusuka apho, iNkosi yenu yiNkosi yamazulu nomhlaba, Eyadala bona, mna ke mayela noko ndingomye wamangqina.”
Ke kaloku (mna ndifunga) ngoAllâh, ndiya kuqulunqa icebo ngokuchasene nemifanekiso eqingqiweyo yenu nisakuba nimkile nina
